description: This source file defines a React functional component UploadModal that provides a UI for uploading PDF notes to a Supabase backend. It manages form inputs, performs validation, uploads files to Supabase Storage, inserts metadata into a database table, and handles user interactions such as closing the modal and displaying errors.

methods.name: doUpload
methods.description: Handles the form submission: validates inputs, uploads the PDF file to Supabase Storage, retrieves its public URL, inserts metadata into the 'notes' table, and manages UI state accordingly.
